bibl.title: More About L. Pompeius Niger, Legionary Veteran.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II
bibl.author: Whitehorne, John Edwin George

bibl.note: A papyrus from the archive of Niger has been so far overlooked. This is P.S.I. XI, 1183 = C.P.L. 170 = F.I.R.A. III, 8. - P. 450: The Family of L. Pompeius Niger.
Whitehorne John Edwin George, More About L. Pompeius Niger, Legionary Veteran.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 445-450, 1 tabl.
